description:
From MEC, an insulated double sleeping pad that performs superbly, at a price point we're totally proud to offer. Using warm synthetic insulation, we opted for offset baffles – each one overlaps the next – so cold spots don't develop while you sleep, and we welded the insulation to the ends and bottom of the pad to prevent it from shifting. Inflation is a breeze, thanks to the included pump sack.

  • Made of abrasion-resistant 75-denier polyester
  • Internal TPU laminate has welded seams keep the paid air tight
  • Offset internal baffles eliminate cold spots
  • 160g of high loft synthetic insulation provides warmth without weight or bulk
  • Dual air chambers let both sleepers fill to their desired firmness
  • Bi-directional low-profile valve (with one port for inflation and one port for deflation)
  • Hook-and-loop strap keeps the pad rolled for storage
  • Included pump sack makes inflation quick and easy, and it doubles as a lightweight, water-resistant stuff sack for your sleeping bag or extra layers
  • Stuff sack and repair kit included
name: MEC VectAir Insulated Double Sleeping Pad - Unisex
